tool_description: An API showing all the latest Climate Change News around the world
name: Monitor Climatico Mundial - Mundial  Climate Change
title: Monitor Climatico Mundial - Mundial  Climate Change
tool_name: Monitor Climatico Mundial - Mundial  Climate Change

api_list.name: Get Individual New Source News
api_list.description: Gets News about Climate Change from a specific new resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://monitor-climatico-mundial-mundial-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "monitor-climatico-mundial-mundial-climate-change.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
